display_name: [Battle to Become the Strongest] Super Saiyan Goku (GT)

kit.leader_skill: "GT Heroes" or "Goku's Family" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +170%

super_attack.name: Kamehameha (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes immense damage to enemy; Massively lowers DEF

passive_skill.name: Pure Power
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 250% up; (Forever) Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type to Rainbow Ki Spheres; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK 30% up, DEF 20% up and chance of performing a critical hit 10% up per Ki Sphere obtained; 3 or more Ki Spheres obtained: Attacks are effective against all Types; 5 or more Ki Spheres obtained: Launches an additional Super Attack; Per "GT Heroes" or "Giant Ape Power" Category ally attacking in the same turn (depending on which Category has more members) (self excluded): DEF 77% up; Damage reduction rate 20% up; For 1 turn from the character's entry turn: Launches an additional Super Attack; When activating the Active Skill: ATK 350% up and performs a critical hit temporarily

lines.text: Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type to Rainbow Ki Spheres
ATK 30% up, DEF 20% up and chance of performing a critical hit 10% up per Ki Sphere obtained
lines.context: When attacking with 12 or more Ki

lines.text: Attacks are effective against all Types
lines.context: 3 or more Ki Spheres obtained
5 or more Ki Spheres obtained
Per "GT Heroes" or "Giant Ape Power" Category ally attacking in the same turn (depending on which Category has more members) (self excluded)
Per "GT Heroes" or "Giant Ape Power" Category ally attacking in the same turn (depending on which Category has more members) (self excluded)
For 1 turn from the character's entry turn

lines.text: ATK 350% up and performs a critical hit temporarily
lines.context: When activating the Active Skill

active_skill.name: All-Out Kamehameha
active_skill.effect: Massively raises ATK temporarily; Causes ultimate damage to enemy
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated after performing 4 or more s in battle (once only)
